law.catch_line: Construction favoring establishment clause, religious liberty, and free speech.

text.section: Nothing in KRS 158.181 to 158.187 shall be construed to affect, interpret, or in any way address the establishment clause.

The specification of religious liberty or free speech rights in KRS 158.181 to 158.187 shall not be construed to exclude or limit religious liberty or free speech rights otherwise protected by federal, state, or local law.

law.history: Created 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 294, sec. 4, effective July 15, 1998.
